record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--H.R. 3221

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that at 2:15 p.m., Tuesday, April 1, the Senate proceed to the motion to reconsider the vote by which cloture was not invoked on the motion to proceed to H.R. 3221; that the motion to reconsider be agreed to; further, that the time until 2:30 p.m. be equally divided and controlled between the two leaders with the majority leader controlling the final 7 1/2 minutes; that at 2:30 p.m, without further intervening action or debate, the Senate proceed to vote on the motion to invoke cloture on the motion to proceed to H.R. 3221.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
